website_summaries.verdict: This affordable tabletop shuffleboard is a good choice for kids and casual players.
pros: A mini shuffleboard that can be played on a table and tucked away
Despite its low price, the board is sturdy and the playing surface is smooth
44-3/4-inch-by-12-3/4-inch table comes with 8 small roller-bearing pucks

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: I really want to give 5 stars. However, my one complaint is the you have to be REALLY LIGHT, I mean really light with your release. The pucks glide very easily on this surface, so if you release too hard, it's easy to hit the gutter. Otherwise, I love this product because it small which makes it very portable. The design and craftwork and paint and so on is really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Hughly disappointing, WOULD have been good
customer_reviews.text: This would have been fun....at first look it seems like sturdy construction BUT...it is warped. You CANNOT play without a level and shims. This was NOT a cheap game by any means. I’m way past t return on it. I’d advise against this game. Way too much trouble to bring it out and level and shim just to play. Kids don’t touch it because it’s warped and the balls always going into the “gutter”. No fun
customer_reviews.author: Domsgram

customer_reviews.title: No complaints, It is a lot of family fun
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews of this scared me some before I purchased it, but I do not play real shuffleboard so I was not looking for tournament quality and for perspective, last year we played on a $10 plastic model and had a blast so this was worth the risk for some silly family fun. It is solid, seems well built, the surface seems to be in good condition and the bearings glide across as they should. Its a great tabletop game for the family, even the young ones love to push the pieces down the board.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Well made! Looking forward to playing shuffleboard with my grandsons. Just an added note: at the time of purchase, there were two items suggested to buy with it, a silcone spray & a powder that are supposed to make the surface very slick. I contacted Carrom and asked if these items were necessary. They said no: "We would not recommend you use anything on the surface other than a duster and if absolutely necessary a barely damp soft cloth."
customer_reviews.author: SMH

customer_reviews.title: Board is great, but the pucks are crap
customer_reviews.text: The board is very solid and very close to our classic Shuffle Shot board that we've had for 30 years. The only problem is with the pucks. They do not roll true and wiggle across the board. You will roll it straight and can watch the puck drastically change direction. Now, this has made for some interesting games where it looked like the puck juked around another one, of course it was planned then. :) I'm planning on seeing if the company will replace the pucks or I might just buy replacements, but we are just using the 30 year old pucks from the original game for now.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Fun, takes a bit of practice.
customer_reviews.text: Good, fun, as expected. Felt like it was a little pricey for it's build/construction. Takes a lot of 'technique' trying to get the "pucks" to not roll off the end. Kids get a bit frustrated quickly. Overall not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: CO Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Wish it was a bit cheaper. Overall nice quality. Only problem was getting potential splinters on the inside of the “gutters” when retrieving the marbles.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Wow for the money this packs a punch!!! It’s huge and made of wood! Who doesn’t like shuffleboard and so much better than having a huge table in your house. Perfect for the white elephant gift exchange I’m bringing it to!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ASKLiberty

customer_reviews.title: Fun for family!
customer_reviews.text: We had this game many years ago and it disappeared somewhere along the way so we decided to replace it. This is very high quality tabletop shuffleboard. Solid wood, nice and level. Great addition to family game night!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family game
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of the shuffle board. It takes a bit of practice and skill so it isn't appropriate for kids younger than 8 or 9. The only thing you need to be careful about is making sure the board is completely level. We were experiencing some frustration until I realized the table I had the board on wasn't level.
customer_reviews.author: Betteke

customer_reviews.title: Like, but Quality of Pucks Not Great
customer_reviews.text: Fell in love with the concept of this game while playing at a brewery on vacation, so we ordered one for our family when we got home. The pucks are VERY inconsistent. The reds all cruise at Mach 3 while the Blues drag like the brakes are on. I wish I complained a while ago or returned it for new Pucks.
customer_reviews.author: JPDINNJ

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine today and it's great. Very well made, the pucks move nicely, and it fits perfectly across a small folding pool table I recently purchased, so my wife and I can play this by simply setting it on the pool table. The pucks are a little small, but it's not a giant board so....
customer_reviews.author: A. Leavelle

customer_reviews.title: Love playing with my kids and now they have hooked ...
customer_reviews.text: Love playing with my kids and now they have hooked their friends. Love not seeing them buried in their electronics. Be warned tho...it can get loud as you scream for your pucks to "sit" or "smash" your opponents. :). A great family game!
customer_reviews.author: D. Picardi

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm...I'll get back to u
customer_reviews.text: Nice board however I had to repair it before I could use it. On one long side of the board, the wood was separated due to lack of sealant or a bad sealant on the back side. It was well packaged so I don't think it was due to shipping. Gonna enjoy it with family this weekend (fingers crossed).
customer_reviews.author: TwoCuteDimples13

customer_reviews.title: This is so much fun!! We played it for hours on Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. This is so much fun!! We played it for hours on Christmas eve and it's great when friends are over. He said it's the best gift I've ever given him. If I could rate it more than 5 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Morley

customer_reviews.title: Old school wins again!
customer_reviews.text: Had this game as a kid, then played with my own kids and this was a gift for them and their future kids. Simple but fun/entertaining and allows for hours of conversation. Old school wins again!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, good intro to real shuffleboard
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should know, this is not a standard 'regulation' shuffle board. It is a mini version of it. It is much more practical though, and still a lot of fun. You do not need the sand for the pucks, as they have a ball in them and roll on the board. The board stores pretty well (at least much better than a full-sized one!) The only thing I'm worried about, is that the ball pucks might damage the surface after a lot of us. I already noticed some of the paint 'rubbing' off. Not much, but something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Needs a Touch or Two
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality table, it was bigger than I expected. On the other hand, please send an extra puck or two per team, this table will last 40 years, I will lose a puck in 5 days. Also, the rules must have been written by a flunking kindergartner. I know how to play shuffleboard already, and was pretty sure I didn't know how to play after reading the rules, I though a page must be missing or something. Got on line and got real rules for the kids to read. If you open this around your kids, do yourself a favor and get good directions before you open the box, so you don't have that waiting letdown.
customer_reviews.author: Fraugher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy/Fun/American made
customer_reviews.text: Great and made in AMERICA! I WOULD USE IT ON A TABLE TOP OR COUNTER, NOT THE FLOOR BUT YOU COULD. WELL MADE. SOLID. WOULD BUY AGAIN! GREAT FOR ALL AGES TO PLAY TOGETHER.
customer_reviews.author: Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap looking, looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game and has been used a multiple different events we have had. Not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: dennynice

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Game! You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game, and Carrom has made it in the ideal size, for family fun! The quality is excellent; plus, almost anyone can play it. The Pucks slide very easily, and true, just like a full sized version...but, you don’t need any powder!
customer_reviews.author: Edward G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: a well made classic.
customer_reviews.text: I remember having a lot of fun with one of these as a child. My kids gave this to PopPop this Christmas and everyone had a good time playing with it. The board is well made. I like that it's Made-in-the-USA. There are several ways to play and and all ages are able to participate. Everyone from 4 to the 64 had a good time and the board stores standing upright in a closet so it doesn't take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Lea

customer_reviews.title: Great Yard Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is really well made. It's substantial and beautifully crafted. We bring it out into the back yard when we have people over and it's a blast to play. I've gifted one to my son and his roommates and they love theirs as well. Highly recommend as a fun game to play while socializing.
customer_reviews.author: Annet

customer_reviews.title: Slide 'em on down!
customer_reviews.text: Great little game for a rainy Saturday night. Two of our "pucks" wobble a little bit but that just made for a better time considering the four of us playing were doing a little wobbling of our own by the third game. I didn't care for the light wood border so I got a cheap can of dark stain and fixed that the next day. Fits under the couch perfectly and we pull it out every two or three weeks and have little shuffleboard tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: Jarett N.

customer_reviews.title: Fun game to play with friends
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game to play with friends and family. Good alternative for when you can't get outside to play the real thing! The quality of the game matches the price. Would have liked for it to come with a storage case for the play pieces but other than that, it functions well.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: shuffleboard
customer_reviews.text: This product is a nice, smaller version of a shuffleboard game allowing for it to be placed wherever you want to play. I wish the discs were a bit bigger so it was easier to handle them but Im guessing they cant be so they can fit in the different point areas. The game rules included are a little confusing but we just play the old fashioned rules and have a great time!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Knutzen

customer_reviews.title: Game was very much fun for kids all summer long
customer_reviews.text: Game was very much fun for kids all summer long, but then the metal ball started to rust and they didn’t roll as smooth anymore, making it very hard to play.
customer_reviews.author: grayer player

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, Buy Now for the Best Family Fun EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I invested in these tried and truly family games as a way to get the grandkids off the XBOX and TV and into traditional style games. This bowing was a true hit by all ages, from 2 to 75 :) If you are looking to get back to basics with tried and true family games that will provide hours of enjoyment, purchase this and other Carrom games.
customer_reviews.author: James Myers

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting something much less sturdy. The small pucks act a little wonky at ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly well mad. I was expecting something much less sturdy. The small pucks act a little wonky at times but the ball bearings don't stick. The board is fairly long at 4" so in a two player game someone has to retrieve the pucks after each round. The recessed area around the edge keeps the pucks from flying off the board but out of play. A great rainy day buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like sloppy workmanship
customer_reviews.text: Packing was ok. Item was damaged. Side rails pulled apart from the top playing surface. Looks like sloppy workmanship. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: James Schlesselman

customer_reviews.title: Good gift!
customer_reviews.text: The recipient of this gift was excited about it and liked it. He is a older Elementary aged kid. I am an adult and to me it seems kind of boring, but thankfully he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: BigJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic game! Bought it as a Christmas gift and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic game! Bought it as a Christmas gift and it was a huge hit with kids and adults alike. The price is very fair for the set and the board is very well made. If you like easy to learn, fun to play tabletop games, you just found a great one. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great value, good quality, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun with family at mountain getaway. Even my wife who doesn't generally like games, enjoys this one. Everyone comments about the quality given the price paid. Fits on a five foot folding table easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun in a compact board!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun little version of the larger shufle boards that you find in pubs. Don't let it's small size fool you, it is challenging as you have to develop a touch so you don't send your puck off the board. Whenever we pull out this game we spend the rest of the evening playing because it is that much fun!
customer_reviews.author: L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: well made great game.
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with everyone else, this is a fun well made game. The whole family seems to enjoy it. And it would be nice if they gave a couple extra pucks...but we are being careful. To replace the pucks seems to cost about 1/2 the price of the game...so I guess if we loose some, I plan to buy a cheaper plastic rebound version, and get the pucks that way.
customer_reviews.author: eazzy

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF FUN, EASY TO PLAY
customer_reviews.text: LOTS OF FUN, EASY TO PLAY, VERY ENGAGING AND CHALLENGING, FUN FOR HOMEPLAY, JUST THE RIGHT SIZE FOR PUTTING ON DINNER TABLE AND PLAYING, MAKES THE WIFE A LITTLE NUTTY THOUGH CUZ ME AND THE KIDS KEEP PLAYING ALL THE TIME!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Maddox

customer_reviews.title: Great game and not just for little kids!
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing. At first, my hubby criticized me for buying this, saying it was just a little kiddie game. Well, we play with it almost every night and it's just the two of us senior citizens here! Really fun and doesn't take up a lot of room. Will store easily, too--if we ever decide to put it away!
customer_reviews.author: lbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Christmas Present!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our nephews for Christmas. They absolutely loved it!! They could not wait to get it out of the box and start playing with it. The board is well made and looks great! The marble pieces are well made too. We played it a couple times over Christmas and it reminded me of a larger one I had played at a restaurant with some friends. My wife and I may even buy one for when we have friends over.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Board is Great.  Discs are Not.
customer_reviews.text: Board is very sturdy quality made product. The discs that come with the game are about 50% good. Half of them are uneven and jump all over the board when you slide them. Tried sanding them down but not much better.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with push sticks so it is a little different then the original game
customer_reviews.author: lippy310

customer_reviews.title: great made in America board game.  Must have.
customer_reviews.text: great product that will last forever as long as you don't loose the little pieces. I do wish that I had some kind of little storage for the pucks. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with no pucks.. so much for ordering in time for my family gathering. In addition the original carrom game I ordered arrived damaged.. 2 for 2, no good and not in time and disappointed..I don't have time for this Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Great game board. Love playing it with my kids and grandkids
customer_reviews.author: Diana.Liston

customer_reviews.title: Missing the 8 pucks it says it comes with. ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing the 8 pucks it says it comes with. I did order replacement pucks so I will wrap those with the Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good Times
customer_reviews.text: This simple little game has given me and friends hours of enjoyment. We stretch it across the pool table.. and play teams.. it is very well built.. and deceptively difficult.. and very competitive. When the game is over.. it fits neatly out of the way. I highly recommend this game.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Suter

customer_reviews.title: This game is so much fun! Got it before my Christmas party had friends ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is so much fun! Got it before my Christmas party had friends surrounding it for hours playing the game and also on New Years Eve very well made great quality. Highly recommended for families and adults
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine wade

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! Such a great family game and my boys will play for hours-beats having them playing video games! Very nicely built and durable and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my mom and we love going over to play it. Simple and easy set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: So  cool !
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for something fun to give my youngest son, age 26, to keep the "kid" in him for Christmas. This shuffleboard game is fantastic. He lives in an apartment so this is a good size to store under the couch, yet it's long enough to make it necessary to be skillful to win. I'm going to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Howlin’Usual

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and sturdy product. The game is lots of fun for all ages. The marbles move smoothly across the board. A big hit in our house for both kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: AC13MTP

customer_reviews.title: This shuffleboard is so fun to play!
customer_reviews.text: This shuffleboard is so fun to play! Great value and quality build. My kids love playing shuffleboard now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: We have had a lot of fun playing the shuffleboard game
customer_reviews.author: Oregon G-Ma

customer_reviews.title: It is the perfect table game
customer_reviews.text: I brought this game a couple months ago. My family plays this game for hours. It is the perfect table game. Doesn't take up much space but it is just the right size to demonstrate shuffleboard skills.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Reporting

customer_reviews.title: Great Game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great old time game that is really high quality. I have purchased 3 of these one for my family and two as gifts. All 3 arrived in perfect condition and very solid construction
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: This is a great quality product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great quality product! We bought one for each of my brother in laws and had a great time playing with it at Christmas. It has a true "shuffleboard" feel. The discs roll very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Pacific NW Girl

customer_reviews.title: bought for Christmas and still going strong at the family ...
customer_reviews.text: bought for Christmas and still going strong at the family camp, all age groups using it and banging on it. no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A classic game...
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard in our family. We still have one from when my son was younger. His sons enjoyed it when they visited for Thanksgiving, and requested it for Christmas. Adults can have fun with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL quality. Heavy duty, solid wood. Will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Valarie  J K

customer_reviews.title: Nice board!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this board. Solid, well made. Great pieces. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is wonderful..
customer_reviews.text: Quality is wonderful ... surface is very smooth and works great. The Youth Group is going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Church Secretary

customer_reviews.title: Pub game in your house
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and hours of fun. Great engaging game that us fun to play over a few beers.
customer_reviews.author: C. S.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Our family enjoys this game. Grandkids rage from 7-16. Well constructed, nice wood. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game my little brothers have been playing for the past two hours non stop thanks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dutchy

customer_reviews.title: A+ Product
customer_reviews.text: Well made & a great price. Can't go wrong here. It's warming to know that these type of quality games still exist
customer_reviews.author: Nick & Erin

customer_reviews.title: great product.
customer_reviews.text: Had a blast with this during family time....great product...Only thing, you really need a table that doesn't move at all...
customer_reviews.author: Darlena Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Very fun, worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family Christmas gift . Everyone loved it. Since we don't have a lot of room, this table top version is perfect. The family can gather around the table and watch the game. I hope that we'll be able to get the marble replacements, I haven't checked.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Tabletop shuffleboard!
customer_reviews.text: This simple tabletop boardgame is actually fun for kids and adults alike! Made of decent quality (a couple of the 'discs' don't always run smoothly), I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Julie1978

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Shuffleboard
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't compare to a full size shuffleboard table, but still fun if you like the game. The little roller pucks slide nicely. Board was in great shape when it arrived with no warp and a smooth surface.
customer_reviews.author: John Christiansen

customer_reviews.title: the board was good quality but the metallic marble sliders were corroded and ...
customer_reviews.text: the board was good quality but the metallic marble sliders were corroded and did not slide well. poor quality for being made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun game! I look forward to many nights of unplugged family fun!
customer_reviews.author: Diddyp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even better quality than I expected. My 6 year old son loves it
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Venner

customer_reviews.title: Not as much fun as a full sized board
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Not as much fun as a full sized board. Kids got bored with it very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Joe Shmo

customer_reviews.title: Game is fine but 2 of the eight pucks did not roll ...
customer_reviews.text: Game is fine but 2 of the eight pucks did not roll properly on receipt due to damaged ball bearing. Seeking puck replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I had this item in my wish list for a long time, but I finally pulled the trigger when the kids got out of school for the summer. It's been an instant hit. The playing surface is smooth and attractive. The plastic and metal pucks are good quality and have a nice feel. The instruction sheet included with the game is less than inspirational, but easy enough to understand (hey, it's shuffleboard, not rocket science)... but I would have preferred a few variations or a blurb on strategy. But this is a quality "analog" game for a great price. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WT

customer_reviews.title: well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is better than I expected for the money! The pucks aren't perfect, but my kids have had lots of fun with it and it is a good deal for the price! Larger than I expected and fun for all ages!
customer_reviews.author: jennyr

customer_reviews.title: All ages fun game.
customer_reviews.text: Had a fantastic day playing this board game. Had no problems with any of the pucks. Glad I bought this to get the whole family involved. Ages 6 to 73.
customer_reviews.author: DVS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow a company that hasn't sacrificed a quality product for cheap parts... Kudos Carrom!
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! The ball bearings move smoothly--they exceeded my expectations! The board is really nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So fun to have on our bar top for guest to play around with.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mortvedt

customer_reviews.title: My Dad (83 yrs Young) LOVES this game....and so do I.
customer_reviews.text: My dad goes on and on about finding a place to play shuffleboard. I've searched on the web, but couldn't find any place near for him to play. Then, shopping on Amazon, I found this game and decided to take a chance. Did I ever luck out! This game has the same feel as a regulation size board. And it costs much less. Plus, you don't have to move the sofa out to the garage as you would a full size. Seems durable, but time will be the test. I couldn't have got him a better present! Well, I can't chat anymore, I've got to get back over to his house and try to beat his ......you know!
customer_reviews.author: A. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Shuffleboard new ways
customer_reviews.text: My grand kids really like this! They have even designed their own rules and point values. Amazing when creativity is sparked. Seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Quirky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my recent purchase. There was a defect in the original shipment and Amazon was so quick to send me a replacement in time for the holidays. I had contacted the manufacturer several times before contacting Amazon. I never heard from the manufacturer. Sadly I will not buy any more of their products, but I will be back to shop on Amazon. What a great website!!!!
customer_reviews.author: my3obies

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't sure if this would be liked but it has been a huge success
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if this would be liked but it has been a huge success. Enjoy hours of fun with it
customer_reviews.author: Mary Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice for family time
customer_reviews.text: Good - We are enjoying this. Great for family time. Maybe a bit small. Bad - Pucks are made cheaply, so little x-tra time spent so they would track straight.
customer_reviews.author: Travis P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: This game is sturdy and well-made - the only drawback is that some of the pucks do not roll well so there is a lack of consistency in how one would approach a shot. The game should include extra pucks.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: What a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago and it was great..when I saw this online I had to have it..and it's just as much fun as the one I had before..the whole family loves it..Hours of entertainment for such a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: K. Dreyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the aftercare I help staff. Both the kids and staff love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Carr Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No storage, but fun
customer_reviews.text: It's small but we enjoyed. The only issue is there is no where to store the pieces when you put it away.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The game is pretty cool. Works very well. My family really enjoys playing it.
customer_reviews.author: bmola

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, good value
customer_reviews.text: I like to have a new, old-school toy or game for the family on Christmas morning. I was a bit hesitant to buy this because of the negative reviews regarding the pucks, which was that they were poorly made and didn't go straight. I figured I'd take a chance. It worked out great. The pucks glide fine, and the board is nicely made. A good value. We had, and continue to have a lot of fun with this. My only suggestion is that they figure out some kind of puck storage mechanism, even a felt bag stapled to the bottom; I keep the pucks in a zip-lock bag while this stands up in the corner when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: jviss

customer_reviews.title: Family Game Night
customer_reviews.text: My family and I just love this game! We’re wet competitive when playing the game. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is so fun. Made a great gift for my parents. Fun to play. Good quality board.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: My wife got me this for Christmas and it's already been great! My 6 & 8 year old kids picked ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I used to play "real shuffleboard" in bars b.c. (before children). I've always wanted one for my house to play with the kids, but our house doesn't have the 15+ feet you need for a real table. My wife got me this for Christmas and it's already been great! My 6 & 8 year old kids picked it up very quickly and routinely beat me. The pucks slide well and the board is very sturdy. Our dining room table is slightly wider than most and the table sits perfectly going width-wise...and it's small enough to move about the house if we need to eat at the table. A great family add.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great size & family fun
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected (even though I looked at the dimensions before buying), but the size is actually perfect - portable, easy to store. Fun for all ages - my kids (5 & 7) through 70 year olds have had tons of fun with it. Very good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect for coffee table. Was hoping for slightly wider Pucks slide well. Looks good. No rough edges. Hoping it lasts along time
customer_reviews.author: Tekka Pappa

customer_reviews.title: Well made and fun to play
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Well made and fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product especially for the price! The paint does rub off a bit, but all you need is a black and red permanent marker! Everyone that visits loves playing it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Quality American Made Product
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to enjoy a quality American made (in Michigan, I believe) product. I've had it for two days so far and everyone who's tryied it out really seems to enjoy it! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: John Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Hooked! This game is a winner. I find myself just walking by and playing a round or two. Great interactive game to play with family and friends, and nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: matbad

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 12 year old daughter. We have only had it a few days, but so far everyone in the house loves to play. We've already had some pretty heated battles.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B. Krott

product_meta.title: Carrom 650.01 Shuffleboard Game
product_meta.description:
Shuffleboard doesn’t have to be a fair-weather sport. Enjoy it year round from the comfort of your own home or backyard picnic table.

AMAZON.COM
With this game-board-sized shuffleboard game, you can enjoy shuffleboard from your backyard picnic table or the comfort of indoors. The game board features a solid 0.75-inch-thick wood frame and comes with eight roller-bearing pucks. The play surface is painted and features screen-printed graphics that use lead-free ink. No assembly is required. This game is suitable for ages 13 and up. 

Specifications 

 * Length: 44.75 inches 
 * Width: 12.75 inches 
 * Height: 1.5 inches 
 * Weight: 11 pounds 

About Carrom
Carrom's goal for the past 100 years has been to make quality games for the entire family. Their games are American-made and designed to last for generations. 

What's in the Box
Shuffleboard and eight pucks.
feature_bullets: Game-board-sized shuffleboard game; ideal for playing indoors or on your outdoor picnic table
Has a solid 0.75-inch-thick wood frame; no assembly required
The court graphics are screen printed with high quality, wear resistant, lead free ink.
Measures 44.75 inches by 12.75 inches by 1.5 inches; weighs 11 pounds;This game is suitable for use by children under 13 years old.
Long Board and Court version can be played.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
